Title: Requires health insurers to provide coverage for long term medical care for Lyme disease and other tick borne related pathogens
Summary: Requires health insurers to provide coverage for long term medical care for Lyme disease and other tick borne related pathogens.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §§3 & 201, Work Comp L
